name: Sunset Hotel: The Complete Saga
description:
Story: The Sunset Hotel is Los Angeles’ most exclusive resort, as well as its most mysterious. Zero Anderson has never even been inside, but, living in an apartment just down the street, he has always wondered what it would be like to stay there. One day, a mysterious invitation arrives at Zero’s door inviting him to do just that. At first it is the vacation of a lifetime, but after the first night, the true, sinister nature of the hotel begins to reveal itself. Strange shadow creatures roaming the halls, doors inexplicably leading to other dimensions, ordinary guest rooms turning into death traps, and at the center of it all, Benjamin Palmer, the hotel’s mysterious owner. Trapped within its walls, Zero must now explore the mystifying Sunset Hotel in order to find his way home, all while uncovering its many dark, disturbing secrets.  

Sunset Hotel is an adventure RPG similar in style to games in The Legend of Zelda series. Use the arrow keys to move, and WASD to fire projectiles. 

Created for a game design class at West Virginia University.
